function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Delays in delivery of materials due to pandemic","Impact":"Delays in construction projects","Mitigation":"Strengthening supply chain resilience, diversifying suppliers","Technologies":"Digital supply chain management, predictive analytics","People":"Construction companies, suppliers","Owner":"Supply chain managers, construction project managers"},{"Description":"Workers unable to arrive at construction sites due to pandemic restrictions","Impact":"Halting of construction projects","Mitigation":"Implementing remote work policies, providing transportation support","Technologies":"Remote work software, geolocation tracking","People":"Construction workers, construction project managers","Owner":"Construction project managers, HR managers"},{"Description":"Hiring less qualified workforce due to pandemic","Impact":"Decreased productivity and technical performance","Mitigation":"Investing in training programs, improving recruitment strategies","Technologies":"Online training platforms, AI-powered recruitment tools","People":"Construction companies, HR departments","Owner":"HR managers, construction project managers"}]}
